thread.title: Beacon Roofing Supply to Announce Second Quarter 2018 Earnings on May 8, 2018

author: cnbc.com
title: Beacon Roofing Supply to Announce Second Quarter 2018 Earnings on May 8, 2018
text:
HERNDON, Va.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Beacon Roofing Supply, Inc. (Nasdaq: BECN) announced today that its second quarter 2018 earnings results for the period ended March 31, 2018 will be released after market close on Tuesday, May 8, 2018. The same day, the Company will host a webcast and conference call at 5:00 p.m. ET to review and discuss its financial results. The webcast link and call-in number are shown below.
What:
Beacon Roofing Supply Second Quarter 2018 Earnings Results Webcast and Conference Call
When:
Tuesday, May 8, 2018
Time:
5:00p.m. ET
Webcast:
http://ir.beaconroofingsupply.com/events.cfm (live and replay)
Live Call: (720) 634-9063, Conf. ID #8484767
To assure timely access, conference call participants should call in prior to the 5:00 p.m. start time. The second quarter 2018 earnings press release will be available prior to the call at http://ir.beaconroofingsupply.com/releases.cfm .
About Beacon Roofing Supply
Founded in 1928, Beacon Roofing Supply, Inc. is the largest publicly traded distributor of residential and commercial roofing materials and complementary building products, operating 589 branches throughout all 50 states in the U.S. and 6 provinces in Canada. To learn more about Beacon and its family of regional brands, please visit www.becn.com .
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180418006462/en/
Beacon Roofing Supply, Inc.
Joseph Nowicki, Executive VP & CFO
571-323-3940
JNowicki@becn.com
Source: Beacon Roofing Supply, Inc.
